author: A_Brickset_user
title: Conned!
review: I got conned into buying this, thinking it had a full minifig. IT DOESNT! It's just a head and helmet! Lame! I wish it were just the car, so there were no misunderstanding. Or, had I known earlier, i would have gotten the other Ferrari Car #8362!

author: faster345
title: Nothing like #8362
review: From the official photos I thought this set would be similar to the previous pull-back Ferrari #8362 of 2004, but sadly it is not. The car from the side looks nothing like an actual Ferrari 248, it's very mis-shaped. I'm thinking of tearing mine down and using it for parts. May we have a more accurate Ferrari next time please? Cheers.

author: adik_sa_lego
title: i will have to disagree
review:
This is by far, better than 8362 (i own both sets). It has more detail, is more fun to build, and is closer to the 1:24 ratio. I'd give it a 5 to raise the score, but the lack of a minifig brings it down to 4.65.

but then again, not using a minifig makes it look more realistic. i just hope they used a schumacher or a massa helmet instead of the generic red one.

author: Xwing250
title: Good Set, but disapointing!
review: When I first got this set i thought you would be getting a Massa or Raikonnen Minifigure but instead you get a head and a ordinary red helmet attached to the car itself! Not GOOD! Livery is good, I got the "Shell" (2007) stickers not the "Vodafone" (2006)ones.Good attention to detail. This is a great set although spoiled by such a little thing.
